response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that the product has a high intrinsic value to me. Considering its worth to you and its true market value, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market rate and is a unique opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a favorable price. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 9500}
